refnamediv.refpurpose: Deletes all occurrences of the listed members from the specified combination.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Deletes all occurrences of the listed members from the specified combination. The red, r, comb, c, and g commands provide other combination editing capabilities.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the rm command to delete all occurrences of specified members of a given combination.

example.title: Delete members of a given combination.
